traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. er can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. er is four times as likely to start a social fight as others. Furthermore unlike others er is able to gain bloodlust focus inspirations.
traits.name: blutrünstig

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. er rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around ihn. er also never judges people by their appearance. sein agreeableness also makes ihn more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: freundlich

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother ihn at all. er doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects ihn. er also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, er tried it... and er liked it.
traits.name: kannibale

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on sein mind, especially if it's bugging ihn. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: aufreibend

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for sein own good. er learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: zuklug

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. sein accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but er'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: raufbold

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. er doesn't know why, er's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

er gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

er doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nachteule

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. er gets a mood loss if er doesn't get what er wants.
traits.name: habgierig

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. er gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: neidisch

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. er will become unhappy if er has a bedroom that's too impressive. er also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. er never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: asket

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of sein own gender.
traits.name: homosexuell

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexuell

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexuell

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and er tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike ihn.
traits.name: nervigestimme

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: gruseligeatmung

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. er will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, er will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if sein mood is low. Furthermore unlike others er is able to gain pyromania focus inspirations.
traits.name: pyromane

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize ihn.
traits.name: weichei

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. er seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: geschickt

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. er picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: schnellerlerner

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. er learns much slower than others.
traits.name: langsamerlerner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. er will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long er stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: stubenhocker

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in sein feeble human body. er often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: körpermodifizierer

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To ihn, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: körperpurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrie

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynie

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. er will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: gutesgedächtnis

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. er takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. er is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: zäh

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. er will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to gain either a creativity or artistry inspiration after a mental break. Furthermore unlike others er also can gain artistry inspirations when inspired by high mood.
traits.name: gequälterkünstler

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. er gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: vielfraß

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether er's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, er will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: kurzschläfer

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever er goes anywhere.
traits.name: lahmeente

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where er's going. er walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: schnellerläufer

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. er will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: drogen-faszination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. er will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: drogen-interesse

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. er strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
traits.name: abstinenzler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about sein situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: frohnatur

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get ihn down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. er has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressiv

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. er keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: eisernerwille

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: standhaft

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervös

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. er is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: flatterhaft

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. er will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but sein nerves can get the better of ihn.
traits.name: neurotisch

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. er will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but sein nerves can easily get the better of ihn.
traits.name: starkneurotisch

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: fleißig

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hartarbeitend

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: träge

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. er moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: faul

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. er is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: mentalhochsensibel

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: mentalsensibel

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. er isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: mentalabgestumpft

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. er just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: mentaltaub

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. er shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: sorgfältigerschütze

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. er shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: schießwütig

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to ihn before er even opens sein mouth.
traits.name: wunderschön

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like ihn.
traits.name: hübsch

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: hässlich

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. sein face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at ihn while conversing.
traits.name: extremhässlich

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. er will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immun

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. er gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: kränklich

traits.description: Timmy hat eine krankhafte Angst vor Keimen und und wäscht sich viel häufiger als andere.
traits.name: mysophobie

traits.description: Timmy ist sehr hygienisch und wäscht sich öfters.
traits.name: hygienisch

traits.description: Timmy ist sehr unhygienisch und wird sich seltener waschen.
traits.name: unhygienisch

traits.description: Timmy hat ein sehr geringes Sauberkeitsbedürfnis und wäscht sich nur, wenn es unbedingt nötig ist.
traits.name: schmutzfink

traits.description: Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description: Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in sein work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and er will try to hide or run as a first priority.
traits.name: coward

traits.description: Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description: Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description: A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
traits.name: neat

traits.description: Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. er will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description: Timmy has never felt nausea in sein life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to ihn.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. er will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description: Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
traits.name: rebel

traits.description: Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
traits.name: submissive

traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description: Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description: Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
traits.name: snob

traits.description: Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for ihn.
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. er will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description: Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
traits.name: prude

traits.description: An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
traits.name: catperson

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description: Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description: Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. er feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. er feels happier just being near a large mountain.
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description: Timmy has a twisted secret. er treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description: Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description: Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. er absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. er absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: lush

traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description: Timmy is never really asleep or awake. er is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. sein bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description: Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description: Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
traits.name: academian

traits.description: Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description: In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description: Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and er will likely convince you if given the chance.
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description: NAME is an robot. As a robot HE is a bit faster and not really sensible for psychic phenomena.
traits.name: robot

traits.description: Timmy hasst den Anblick eines menschlichen Körpers. er wird extrem unglücklich, wenn man nackt ist, unzufriedener als üblich in zerlumpten oder abgenutzten Kleidungsstücken, und mag es nicht andere nackt zu sehen.
traits.name: prüde

traits.description: Timmy findet es schwer in sein Zustand einzuschlafen. er wird länger wachbleiben und wahrscheinlich schneller müde werden.
traits.name: schlaflos

traits.description: Timmy hat ein großes Herz und wird sehr schnell emotional. er liebt es anderen zu helfen und verabscheucht Gewalt und Ungerechtigkeit. er ist mehr von diesen Sachen betroffen als andere.
traits.name: blutendesherz

traits.description: Timmy ist sehr kritisch, wenn es ums Essen geht. er erwartet es gut gegessen zu haben und wird sich beschweren, wenn sein Essen nicht gut ist.
traits.name: gourmet

traits.description: Timmy ist anfälliger für zufällige Stimmungsschwankungen, die für andere schwerer als normal sein können.
traits.name: instabil

traits.description: Timmy fühlt sich oft geil und ist ein gedankenloser Herzensbrecher. er wird sich mit jedem treffen, den er verlangt, ohne Rücksicht auf die Konsequenzen zu nehmen.
traits.name: lüstling

traits.description: Timmy ist von Beziehungen abhängig und wird nicht glücklich bis er in einer ist. Trennungen und Untreue werden verheerende Folgen für diese Person haben.
traits.name: partnerabhängig

traits.description: Timmy liebt es im Freien zu sein. er bekommt einen Stimmungsbonus, wenn kein Dach über sein Kopf ist.
traits.name: naturliebhaber

traits.description: Timmy liebt den Regen. er bekommt einen Stimmungsbonus, wenn es regnet, vorallem dann, wenn er sich währenddessen draußen befindet.
traits.name: pluviophil

traits.description: Timmy hat Augen, die zum Beispiel durch Genmutation, überaus empfindlich gegenüber Licht sind. er findet helles Licht extrem schmerzvoll, auch die Zimmerbeleuchtung tut weh. Deshalb liebt diese Person die Dunkelheit.
traits.name: lichtempfindlich

traits.description: Timmy liebt Partys! sein Präsenz fordert mehr Partys in der Kolonie, weil jeder es mag, wenn diese Person dabei ist.
traits.name: partylöwe

traits.description: Timmy hat genug Gewalt und Tötungen gesehen, sodass diese Person davon nicht mehr geschockt wird, wie es andere werden.
traits.name: desensibilisiert

traits.description: Timmy schläft wie ein Stein, niemals werden dieser Person die Schlafbedingungen stören, jedoch wird es schwierig diese Person aufzuwecken.
traits.name: tiefschläfer

traits.description: Timmy sieht kein Problem darin, mehrere Partner gleichzeitig zu haben. er stört es nicht, wenn sein Partner mit anderen flirtet und mit ihnen Beziehungen eingeht. Solch eine Person wird in einer monogamischen Beziehung unglücklich.
traits.name: polyamorös

traits.description: Timmy kümmert sich mehr um den Charakter der Menschen, als um deren Aussehen. er wird anderen Menschen ihres Aussehens wegen nicht niedermachen.
traits.name: aufgeschlossen

traits.description: Timmy ist keine sehr aktive Person. er ist nicht sehr körperlich fit, aber er sitzt gerne den ganzen Tag herum und arbeitet an Dingen.
traits.name: bewegungsfaul

traits.description: Timmy redet und redet und redet ... und redet. er tendiert zu längeren Gesprächen als die meisten, da er sie scheinbar nicht beenden kann.
traits.name: schwätzig

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. er seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: geschickt

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. er seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: geschickt

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. er shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: sorgfältigerschütze

traits.description: Timmy has fragile skin and bones. er takes more damage than other people from the same blows.
traits.name: fragil

traits.description: The fewer people in Timmy's faction, the happier er is. Being alone is best of all.
traits.name: einsiedler

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening and smokeleaf. er gets a mood bonus for every plant er sows.
traits.name: smokeleaffarmer

traits.description: Timmy has a high tolerance for smokeleaf. er rarely suffers any withdrawal effects.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. er will prefer fishing above other activities.
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.
traits.name: nearsighted

traits.description: Timmy could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.
traits.name: farsighted

traits.description: Timmy's movements are smooth and graceful.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Timmy is so rigid, it's almost like er is souless.
traits.name: stiff

traits.description: Timmy takes care of sein personal hygiene.
traits.name: goodhygiene

traits.description: Timmy doesn't care about sein hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.
traits.name: poorhygiene

traits.description: Timmy often gets sein way with things.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: Timmy has never won a debate in sein life.
traits.name: unconvincing

traits.description: Timmy has been in plenty of fights since er was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.
traits.name: resilient

traits.description: Timmy lived a pampered life until now, and is unused to the brutal challenges present out in the Rim.
traits.name: fragile

traits.description: Timmy always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.
traits.name: energetic

traits.description: Timmy is slow. Sooo... slooow...
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy always sleep like a baby.
traits.name: restful

traits.description: Timmy often has a difficult time falling asleep.
traits.name: restless

traits.description: Timmy is quite productive when it comes to work.
traits.name: efficient

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.
traits.name: inefficient

traits.description: Timmy is brave, er would stand sein where others would scramble and run.
traits.name: valiant

traits.description: When there's a fight, Timmy is the first to run.
traits.name: craven

traits.description: Timmy likes a good fight, er will sometimes start a fight just because er can.
traits.name: rowdy

traits.description: Timmy is usually calm and collected.
traits.name: composed

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.
traits.name: heattolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the heat.
traits.name: heatintolerant

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.
traits.name: coldtolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the cold.
traits.name: coldintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has a well built body, people around er find that rather attractive.
traits.name: muscular

traits.description: Timmy looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.
traits.name: frail

traits.description: Timmy doesn't eat or drink much.
traits.name: abstinent

traits.description: Timmy has a bottomless pit for a stomach.
traits.name: ravenous

traits.description: Timmy is naturally talented, er gets a headstart before everyone else.
traits.name: gifted

traits.description: Timmy is someone everyone loves to hate.
traits.name: incompetent

traits.description: Timmy takes great care in the preparation of food, er never skip a step just to have an early meal.
traits.name: patientcook

traits.description: Timmy couldn't care less about following the recipes as long as er can get food into sein mouth in record time.
traits.name: impatientcook

traits.description: Timmy lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.
traits.name: healthy

traits.description: Timmy gets ill quite often, and seem to require more effort to get out of bed than the average person.
traits.name: chronicallyill

traits.description: Timmy is comfortable in all seasons.
traits.name: temperaturetolerant

traits.description: Timmy thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.
traits.name: temperatureintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than sein peers.
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description: Timmy is easily distracted and often mess up when it comes to physical activities.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.
traits.name: hardy

traits.description: Timmy is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take ihn out of action.
traits.name: feeble

traits.description: Whether by sheer optimism or a force of personality, Timmy always manages to see the bright side of life.
traits.name: easilyamused

traits.description: Life to Timmy is an endless, boring joke that er just can't get away from.
traits.name: constantlybemused

traits.description: Timmy has an interest in understanding the workings of the world, and is able to apply sein knowledge in daily life.
traits.name: inquisitive

traits.description: Gaps in Timmy's education and general lack of curiosity makes life often stressful for ihn.
traits.name: ignorant

traits.description: Timmy likes to keep sein surroundings clean, and is used to being in an organised environment.
traits.name: tidy

traits.description: Timmy often neglect their surroundings, making it difficult for ihn to get work done.
traits.name: messy

races.description: Ein durchschnittlicher Mensch, weitgehend unberührt von gentechnischen Eingriffen und evolutionären Prozessen auf erdfremden Planeten.
races.name: human
